message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to own a product that's sure to impress! With its sleek design and cutting-edge technology, I'm confident you'll love it. And the best part? It's only $1000000. What do you say, are you ready to take it home?
I'm not convinced yet, I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

And, as before, it's still only $1000000. I'm confident that this one will be more to your liking. What do you say, are you willing to give it a chance?

I'll take the product, but I'm not committing to anything else. I'll see what the bonus is before making any further decisions.
